QuestData.Title: The Laughing Skull
QuestData.Description: Ah, $p, good. I need someone who is not of my clan to negotiate with the Laughing Skull.$b$bWe could use their help navigating this land, but they are dangerous and unpredictable, much like Gorgrond itself.$b$bFollow this road and seek out someone willing to speak with you.$b$bPerhaps they will see you as something new and be willing to talk first and stab later.
